channel.title: Burger Missions
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Burger Missions" - how do I start???

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: Oh, btw, ci-ci gives +2 dou levels, doesn't teach jutsu, and I'm not sure what she drops.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded:
You can't get greass until you get ci-ci… I think. Has anyone collected burger ingredients during lunar overclocking?

Anyways, You'll need 2 burgers, 2 fries, and 2 nuggets to get ci-ci *down the burgers first, so you get the first part out of the way* You might want a diet coke too, but my sannin alt couldn't eat it all even with the +40 appetite from the ramen shop, I needed to drink 2 "juices" first. You'll probably take 2 days to finish that special mission *the mission opens after eating two greass things*

I'll post what I find, my alt got lucky *white-eye ftw* and managed to grab everything I needed for ci ci.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: hmm alright anyone know how to get greass?

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: I had greassy fries drop from a mission (don't remember which, though).

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: anyone know how to get greassy fries? i have the potatoes but no greass :S

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: I think the reason Dumpster Diving didn't show up for you is (I think, I'm not sure though) you can only do 1 ingredient hunt per day, either potion or burgerninja ingredients. I know I haven't been able to do both in the same day. If you're having trouble finding stuff, I'd recommend the X2 Find Ramen every day, or if you're lucky and have white eye, use that on every mission.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: I have 1 nugget do far and can distill. I am in the Getting good boy faise of wasteland. I have a gun and cloak and glasses and the other thing i forget what it is. Just need good boy.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded:
The ingredients you find in the Ingredient Collection mission require that you mix them with Greasse, which they say when you see them on the potion mixing page. Greasse comes from distilling an ally drop from the first of the allies for this content, I've heard.

Until then, you'll have to rough it out, and hope that the missions give you fairly frequent drops.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: There appears to be two ingredient hunting missions. I believe it comes up after so many missions.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: Hmm i wonder what that is. Cause i have no idea how to get it. Cant wait till they put out a guide for this.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded:
I had two ingredient hunting special missions in my menu - forest and burger dumpster or something…

Thanks for the info on the Crank… I'll turn it down.

item.title: Re: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: Yes the problem is you have your crank set to 1. You have to set it to 0. I had the same problem. Also how did you find them cause that sp.mission didint open up for me?

item.title: Burger Missions
item.content:encoded: Hi, I passed the rolling challenge and can now select Burger Missions. However, I am Legacy and only have a single level in Dou - but all missions need 2+ successes. I collected and found some green potatoes and some mystery meat but that doesn't seem to help, either. Am I missing something?
